N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7076.4 - Conditions and function

State Regulations
(a) All
facility housing areas in which incarcerated individuals are subject to
segregated confinement shall create the least restrictive environment necessary
for the safety of incarcerated persons, staff, and the security of the
facility. (b) No individual may be
placed in segregated confinement based on the same act or incident that was
previously used as the basis for such placement. (c) No individual may be held in segregated
confinement for protective custody. Any unit used for protective custody must, at a minimum, conform to the requirements governing residential rehabilitation
units, as set forth in Part 7077 of this Title. Notes
